title: Bright 3 Bedroom Apt in Wellesley Center
posting_body: Lovely 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment in Wellesley Center.
Spacious and bright, with beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, a sunroom/office, an eat-in kitchen, a front porch perfect, and two off-street parking spaces.

Very convenient location, within walking distance of Wellesley College and Babson College, as well as Whole Foods, the Linden Street shops, the Wellesley Free Library, Wellesley High School, the Brook Path Parks, and the Commuter Rail to Boston.
Easy access to Route 128/95, Route 16, Route 9, Route 135 and I-90, and a quick commute to Needham, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Natick, Wayland, Weston, Hopkinton, Westwood, Medfield, and Dedham.
Subject to credit and income check.
